name: Pipsy Runner 3000
description:
Early one morning, she felt the world around her and — what's there to say? She ran.

Tip: spaces don't have to be typed.

Partially inspired by Everest Pipkin's "perfectly emulated human body #1."

I am also indebted to Ian for his write up on getting google sheets integrations to work. You can find the write up in the description to his really amazing graveyard game. Thanks Ian :)

Pipsy model is from Diddy Kong Racing. I forget what the other models are from...

Music is "Lullaby" by Grace Ives.

Announcer sounds are from Wii Sports.
